DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate utility 18Fluorine Fluorodeoxyglucose Positron Emission Tomography ( 18FDG-PET ) tool quantify atherosclerotic plaque .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Utility 18FDG-PET Tool Quantify Atherosclerotic Plaque ( MK-0000-081 AM3 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Male Female age 30 80 Participant low dose statin least 6 week prior screen statinnaive screening Participant human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B C Participant use illegal drug Participant Type I diabetes Participant history claustrophobia
